1.title: The Beginning of the Journey

choices: They ran into their friend, rising star adventurer Edward Garrison.
Cord tripped and accidentally knocked over a farmer's cart.
They were held up by a thief.
11.content:
Cordin woke up in his bed, rubbing his eyes. He stretched and yawned, before getting up and getting dressed.

"Morning, sis!" Cordin spoke as he walked into the kitchen.

"Morning, Cord." Mari spoke as she worked, frying an egg in a pan. "You excited for today?"

"Heck yeah I am!" Cord did a little fist-pump. "We're gonna be the best gosh-darn alchemists in the gosh-darn world!"

"Oh, that reminded me. Read this letter." Mari pushed it to Cord, and he picked it up.

To whoever it may concern,
I am so sad to admit that my lord has lost his best friend, not to mention the supply of much of his items. However, after gaining knowledge that our friend Elric has passed away, we remember his children. While we understand that your skill in alchemy is not as high as your father's, we would be happy to see you off on your journey to a great height, by pushing you forward.

Sincerely, Klaus M. Hornbeg, secretary and butler to Erik Kleinmann, Lord of Hamacian

P.S.
Please, prepare a Medicinal Bandage for my arrival this afternoon.

"So, this Klaus guy will be visiting?" Cord asked, his head cocked.

"Yeah, and we better get started on cracking open those books at the workshop. We need to find that recipe for a Medicinal Bandage."

And, so, after a quick breakfast, the two alchemists in training headed to their father's workshop. On the way, something happened.
11.title: Cordin

choices: Sending out a bolt of lightning
Charming her into giving them all her valuables
113.content: As they turned a corner to where their father's old workshop was, a cloaked woman, wearing chainmail beneath, and padded leggs, stopped them. "Alright pipsqueaks," she growled, flashing a serrated dagger, "Hand over any gold and trinkets, and I might let you go." Cordin, seeing the threat to he and his sister's lives, began channeling what magic he had into...
113.title: They were held up by a thief.

choices: Edward came in, and offered to help!
Klaus wandered in, and offered his assistance
The book with the recipe literally fell off the shelf.
1132.content:
"Charge Edge!" Cordin shouted, as he drew his sword. The edge of it glowed with light, and the woman seemed scared of it. She took a few steps back, before running away into an alley.

"Fhew! Thought we were goners for a second there." Cordin sighed, as he sheathed his sword.

"No wonder Elric needs our help, if someone can get robbed in plain daylight like that..." Mari sighed, and started walking towards the alchemist lab.

----------------

Cord opens a book and blows the dust off the pages, before waving his hand in front of his face. "Dang, these books are old."

"It's gonna take us a lot of time to find this 'Medicinal Bandage' recipe!" Mari groaned, as she wiped away the dust on the covers of books, until something lucky happened.
1132.title: Reinforcing his shortsword

choices: Gravelen Forest, noted to be haunted
11323.content:
As Cord sorted through the shelves, his arm bumped up against one, which swiftly tipped out of, and fell off, the shelf. "Damn." he muttered, picking up the book. "Huh." he wiped the cover off, revealing it read "Basic Aid and Medicinal Workings, He grinned, looking to his sister, "Hey sis, I think this could help!" he called out.

Mari zipped over, and began to flip through the pages. "Yes, this it!" she began listing off the ingredients. "Alright, we need to make the cloth, as well as gather the ingredients to infuse the cloth with." she unfurlled a large, old map. "Alright, so the places the Salo'thema herbs, the Warm jelly, and the Xanderin root can be found in are Deerbrook Meadows, Gravelen Forest, and The Mini-Sand desert." Packing some supplies, the duo set out for....

12.content:
Maribelle woke up in her bed, and got ready for her morning: Brushing her hair, getting her clothes on, getting her staff ready. She decided to let her little brother sleep. She went downstairs to the kitchen and begun to make some eggs, starting up a fire and holding a pan over it.

She then realized there was a letter on the counter. She moved to open it and read it as she cooked.

To whoever it may concern,
I am so sad to admit that my lord has lost his best friend, not to mention the supply of much of his items. However, after gaining knowledge that our friend Elric has passed away, we remember his children. While we understand that your skill in alchemy is not as high as your father's, we would be happy to see you off on your journey to a great height, by pushing you forward.

Sincerely, Klaus M. Hornbeg, secretary and butler to Erik Kleinmann, Lord of Hamacian

P.S.
Please, prepare a Medicinal Bandage for my arrival this afternoon.

Cord then came downstairs and she served him the egg.

"Morning, sis!" Cordin spoke as he walked into the kitchen.

"Morning, Cord. You excited for today?"

"Heck yeah I am!" Cord did a little fist-pump. "We're gonna be the best gosh-darn alchemists in the gosh-darn world!"

"Oh, that reminded me. Read this letter." Mari pushed it to Cord, and he picked it up. He read through it.

"So, this Klaus guy will be visiting?" Cord asked, his head cocked.

"Yeah, and we better get started on cracking open those books at the workshop. We need to find that recipe for a Medicinal Bandage."

And, so, after a quick breakfast, the two alchemists in training headed to their father's workshop. On the way, something happened.
12.title: Maribelle

info.brief_description: Two alchemists, each seeking to make a name for themselves in a bold new land.
info.description: Maribelle and Cordin Bellemont, the sole children to the famed alchemist Elric Bellemont, are left to care for his small estate, and Atelier, his alchemical workshop. From a family of merchants, artificers, adventurers, and rogue traders, the duo seek to live up to their family's famed name, and bring honor to themselves, and their father. Follow their journey as they seek to become the greatest alchemists in all of Alkahest!
info.pretty_title: Mari and Cord: Alchemists of the Dawn
